cleaned_text: A carefully curated 4-step routine to deeply clarify and renew your complexion. Ingredients such as Hyaluronic Acid, Licorice Root Extract, and Safflower Seed Oil minimize the appearance of pores and fine lines, even discoloration, and help smooth unwanted texture. These gentle, yet effective formulas balance oil production and reduce redness. RECOMMENDED SKIN TYPE: Combination to Oily, Sensitive and Acne-Prone Set Includes - Petite Micellar Water - Petite Daily Enzyme Exfoliant Crème - Petite Detox Nourishing Masque Luxe Water Crème A carefully curated 4-step routine to deeply clarify and renew your complexion. These gentle, yet effective formulas balance oil production and reduce redness.
